Room.Name: Hafnia Mountain Road/Tasletek Village Road
Room.ShortDescription: Just off the road is a tiny mountain village called Tasletek.
Room.LongDescription: Five small homes and shops lie to the northwest, built on the edge of a deep gorge along the east end of the village. From here, it looks like a traveler could get a hot meal and a warm bed for the night in the inn near the middle of the small community. The mountain road continues to climb eastward, and drop off to the west.
